name: OCR - Extract text
description: Extract texts from images with very high accuracy and supports all languages of the earth.

api_methods.name: Extract text from image url
api_methods.description: Image must be a regular **JPEG** or **PNG** image (with or without transparency).

api_methods.name: Extract text from image file
api_methods.description: Image must be a regular **JPEG** or **PNG** image (with or without transparency).

api_methods.name: Extract text from image file
api_methods.description: Image must be a regular **JPEG** or **PNG** image (with or without transparency).
